TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IModelNameProvider

Docs.summary: Provides a way to specify an alternate name to use for model binding instead of using the parameter name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This interface is implemented by custom value-provider attributes that must have the ability to specify a value-provider key that is different from the parameter name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetModelName() cil managed

Docs.summary: When implemented in a class, gets the model name.
